entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 24. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 12. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
